pullRequest.title: fix #3688, Optimization of table building statements
pullRequest.bodyText:
When executing MySQL table creation statement, it will report that the index length is not enough.
this will happen: Index column size too large. The maximum column size is 767 bytes.
The length of the t_ds_task_instance.app_link is not enough. When hive SQL is complex and yarn will start multiple applications

commit.message: fix #3688, Optimization of table building statements

nodes.bodyText: Why need to use utf8 to replace utd8mb4?
